title: The Residences at NewCity
desc: This property is managed by Beztak, 2022 recipient of the US Best Managed Companies for the third year in a row, sponsored by Deloitte Private and The Wall Street Journal.

title: 1400 Wabash
desc: Located in Chicago’s South Loop, 1400 S Wabash is designed with over a decade of experience developing thoughtful buildings and caring communities.

title: Elevate
desc: Chicago’s best neighborhood just got better. Welcome to ELEVATE Lincoln Park - a brand-new, elegantly designed, luxury apartment building located on a tree-lined street.

title: Central Michigan Avenue
desc: Central Michigan Avenue is within 5 minutes or 0.3 mile from Columbia College Chicago. It is also near DePaul University, Loop Campus and Roosevelt University, Chicago.
